title: Resiliency Parameters
description: List of possible parameters used in the resilient stack

-sla-0-computer_guid.title: Target computer for main instance
-sla-0-computer_guid.description: Target computer GUID for main instance.

-sla-1-computer_guid.title: Target computer for first clone
-sla-1-computer_guid.description: Target computer for first clone and PBS.

-sla-2-computer_guid.title: Target computer for second clone
-sla-2-computer_guid.description: Target computer for second clone and PBS.

pbs1-backup-software-list.title: List of backup softwares used for first clone and PBS.
pbs1-backup-software-list.description: List of backup softwares used for first clone and PBS. WARNING: always put 'rdiff-backup' for safety, as restic is experimental

pbs2-backup-software-list.title: List of backup softwares used for second clone and PBS.
pbs2-backup-software-list.description: List of backup softwares used for second clone and PBS. WARNING: always put 'rdiff-backup' for safety, as restic is experimental

resiliency-backup-periodicity.title: Periodicity of backup
resiliency-backup-periodicity.description: Periodicity of backup, in cron format. Default is every hour.

remove-backup-older-than.title: Remove backups older than...
remove-backup-older-than.description: Remove all the backups in PBS that are older than specified value. It should be rdiff-backup-compatible.
